dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex issues into smaller parts, analyzing data and evidence to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will approach problems from a more innovative angle, generating novel solutions through intuition and exploration.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin handle uncertain or high-risk situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will eagerly take on new challenges and risks, embracing uncertainty as an opportunity for growth.
Your FarTwin will approach uncertain situations with caution, weighing the potential benefits and risks before making a decision.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin work with others to achieve common goals?

options.description: Your FarTwin will prefer to work independently, contributing their expertise and ideas without seeking input from others.
Your FarTwin will actively seek out collaboration and feedback from colleagues, valuing diverse perspectives and input.

dimensions.label: Data Analysis Skills
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin interpret and apply data insights?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully examine and analyze data, identifying subtle patterns and trends.
Your FarTwin will quickly scan and understand large datasets, recognizing key findings and insights.

dimensions.label: Learning Preferences
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new knowledge and skills?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take initiative to learn through self-study, exploring topics of interest at their own pace.
Your FarTwin will benefit from structured learning environments, such as courses or mentorship programs.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin prioritize and manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will adhere to strict deadlines and schedules, ensuring timely completion of tasks.
Your FarTwin will prioritize flexibility in their schedule, adapting to changing circumstances and unexpected challenges.

dimensions.label: Social Interaction Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage with others in social situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will actively seek out social interactions, enjoying the company of others and engaging in small talk.
Your FarTwin will prefer quieter social settings, preferring to observe and listen before contributing to conversations.

dimensions.label: Career Goals
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin pursue their professional aspirations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will set high goals for themselves, striving for leadership positions and recognition.
Your FarTwin will focus on continuous learning and skill-building, seeking to improve their expertise and contribute meaningfully to their field.
